item.description: [name::accept-harm] [SpocWebEntityId::22287] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Convert_harm_into_benefit]]] Use harmful factors (particularly, harmful effects of the environment or surroundings) to achieve a positive effect.

[name::accept-less] [SpocWebEntityId::22271] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Partial,_overdone,_or_excessive_action]]] If 100 percent of an object is hard to achieve using a given solution method then, by using 'slightly less' or 'slightly more' of the same method, the problem may be considerably easier to solve.
[name::add-functions] [SpocWebEntityId::22294] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Self-service]]] Make an object serve itself by performing auxiliary helpful functions.
[name::add-oxygen] [SpocWebEntityId::22323] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Use_strong_oxidisers]]] Replace common air with oxygen-enriched air.
[name::add-ozone] [SpocWebEntityId::22327] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Use_strong_oxidisers]]] Replace ozonized (or ionized) oxygen with ozone.
[name::add-sensor] [SpocWebEntityId::22300] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Replacement_of_a_mechanical_system]]] Replace a mechanical means with a sensory (optical, acoustic, taste or smell) means.

[name::add-structure] [SpocWebEntityId::22302] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Replacement_of_a_mechanical_system]]] Change from static to movable fields(in Space and / or Time), from random or unstructured fields to those having a certain Structure.
[name::allow-pass] [SpocWebEntityId::22253] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Nesting]]] Make one part pass through a cavity in the other.
[name::amplify-harm] [SpocWebEntityId::22289] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Convert_harm_into_benefit]]] Amplify a harmful factor to such a degree that it is no longer harmful.
[name::another-side] [SpocWebEntityId::22275] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Moving_to_a_new_dimension]]] Use 'another side' of a given area.
[name::anti-stresses] [SpocWebEntityId::22257] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Prior_counteracion]]] Create beforehand stresses in an object that will oppose known undesirable working stresses later on.
[name::anticipate-change] [SpocWebEntityId::22258] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Prior_action]]] Perform, before it is needed, the required change of an object (either fully or partially).

[name::arrange-parts] [SpocWebEntityId::22259] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Prior_action]]] Pre-arrange objects such that they can come into action from the most convenient place and without losing time for their delivery.
[name::asymmetrical] [SpocWebEntityId::22247] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Asymmetry]]] A. Change the shape of an object from symmetrical to asymmetrical.

[name::change-aggregate] [SpocWebEntityId::22316] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Transformation_of_physical_and_chemical_states_of_an_object]]] Change an Object's aggregate State(e.g. to a Gas, Liquid, or Solid).
[name::change-color] [SpocWebEntityId::22309] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Changing_the_color]]] Change the Color of an Object or its external Environment.
[name::change-consistency] [SpocWebEntityId::22317] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Transformation_of_physical_and_chemical_states_of_an_object]]] Change the Concentration or Consistency.
[name::change-flexibility] [SpocWebEntityId::22318] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Transformation_of_physical_and_chemical_states_of_an_object]]] Change the Degree of Flexibility.
[name::change-frequency] [SpocWebEntityId::22277] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Mechanical_vibration]]] Increase its frequency (even up to the ultrasonic).
[name::change-temperature] [SpocWebEntityId::22319] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Transformation_of_physical_and_chemical_states_of_an_object]]] Change the temperature.
[name::change-transparency] [SpocWebEntityId::22310] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Changing_the_color]]] Change the Transparency of an Object or its external Environment.
[name::colored-tracer] [SpocWebEntityId::22311] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Changing_the_color]]] Use colored Additives to observe Objects or Processes which are difficult to see.
[name::combine-harm] [SpocWebEntityId::22288] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Convert_harm_into_benefit]]] Eliminate the primary harmful action by adding it to another harmful action to resolve the problem.
[name::combined-oscillations] [SpocWebEntityId::22280] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Mechanical_vibration]]] Use combined ultrasonic and electromagnetic field oscillations.
[name::composite-materials] [SpocWebEntityId::22331] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Composite_materials]]] Change from uniform to composite (multiple) materials.
[name::condition] [SpocWebEntityId::22245] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Local_quality]]] Make each part of an object function in conditions most suitable for its operation.
[name::continuous-load] [SpocWebEntityId::22284] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Continuity_of_useful_action]]] Carry on work continuously; make all parts of an object work at full load, all the time.

[name::control-harm] [SpocWebEntityId::22256] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Prior_counteracion]]] If it will be necessary to do an action with both harmful and useful effects, this action should be replaced with anti-actions to control harmful effects.

[name::curved-shape] [SpocWebEntityId::22265] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Spheroidality]]] Instead of using rectilinear parts, surfaces, or forms, use curvilinear ones; move from flat surfaces to spherical ones; from parts shaped as a cube (parallelepiped) to ball-shaped structures.

[name::different-materials] [SpocWebEntityId::22322] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Thermal_expansion]]] If thermal expansion is being used, use multiple materials with different coefficients of thermal expansion.
[name::different] [SpocWebEntityId::22246] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Local_quality]]] Make each part of an object fulfill a different and useful function.
[name::Disassemble] [SpocWebEntityId::22241] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Segmentation]]] Make an object easy to disassemble.
[name::eliminate-idle] [SpocWebEntityId::22285] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Continuity_of_useful_action]]] Eliminate all idle or intermittent actions or work.
[name::feedback] [SpocWebEntityId::22290] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Feedback]]] Introduce feedback (referring back, cross-checking) to improve a process or action.

[name::fractal-surface] [SpocWebEntityId::22308] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Use_of_porous_material]]] If an object is already porous, use the pores to introduce a useful substance or function. Fractal Structures like Pores have an infinite reactive Surface!
[name::Fragment] [SpocWebEntityId::22242] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Segmentation]]] Increase the degree of fragmentation or segmentation.
[name::high-speed] [SpocWebEntityId::22286] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Rushing_through]]] Conduct a process, or certain stages (e.g. destructible, harmful or hazardous operations) at high speed.
[name::increase-Asymmetry] [SpocWebEntityId::22248] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Asymmetry]]] If an object is asymmetrical, increase its degree of asymmetry.
[name::inert-additives] [SpocWebEntityId::22329] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Inert_environment]]] Add neutral parts, or inert additives to an object.
[name::inert-environment] [SpocWebEntityId::22328] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Inert_environment]]] Replace a normal environment with an inert one.
[name::intermediary] [SpocWebEntityId::22292] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Mediator]]] Use an intermediary carrier article or intermediary process.
[name::invert-action] [SpocWebEntityId::22262] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Inversion]]] Invert the action(s) used to solve the problem (e.g. instead of cooling an object, heat it).
[name::ionized-oxygen] [SpocWebEntityId::22326] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Use_strong_oxidisers]]] Use ionized oxygen.
[name::ionizing] [SpocWebEntityId::22325] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Use_strong_oxidisers]]] Expose air or oxygen to ionizing radiation.
[name::isolate] [SpocWebEntityId::22306] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Flexible_film_or_thin_membranes]]] Isolate the object from the external Environment using flexible shells and thin films.

[name::limit-changes] [SpocWebEntityId::22261] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Equipotentiality]]] In a potential field, limit position changes (e.g. change operating conditions to eliminate the need to raise or lower objects in a gravity field).
[name::luminescent-tracer] [SpocWebEntityId::22312] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Changing_the_color]]] If such Additives are already used, employ luminescent Traces or Tracer Elements.

[name::merge-identical] [SpocWebEntityId::22249] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Combining_(Integration)]]] Bring closer together (or merge) identical or similar objects, assemble identical or similar parts to perform parallel operations.
[name::merge-in-space] [SpocWebEntityId::22252] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Nesting]]] Place one object inside another; place each object, in turn, inside the other.
[name::merge-in-time] [SpocWebEntityId::22250] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Combining_(Integration)]]] Make operations contiguous or parallel; bring them together in time.
[name::merge-temporarily] [SpocWebEntityId::22293] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Mediator]]] Merge one object temporarily with another (which can be easily removed).
[name::movability] [SpocWebEntityId::22263] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Inversion]]] Make movable parts (or the external environment) fixed, and fixed parts movable).
[name::movable-part] [SpocWebEntityId::22270] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Dynamicity]]] If an object (or process) is rigid or inflexible, make it movable or adaptive.
[name::movable-parts] [SpocWebEntityId::22269] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Dynamicity]]] Divide an object into parts capable of movement relative to each other.
[name::move-in-space] [SpocWebEntityId::22272] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Moving_to_a_new_dimension]]] To move an object in two- or three-dimensional space.
[name::multi-story] [SpocWebEntityId::22273] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Moving_to_a_new_dimension]]] Use a multi-story arrangement of objects instead of a single-story arrangement.
[name::multi-urpose] [SpocWebEntityId::22251] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Universality]]] Make a part or object perform multiple functions; eliminate the need for other parts.

[name::non-uniform] [SpocWebEntityId::22244] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Local_quality]]] Change an object's structure from uniform to non-uniform, change an external environment (or external influence) from uniform to non-uniform.

[name::optimal-conditions] [SpocWebEntityId::22268] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Dynamicity]]] Allow (or design) the characteristics of an object, external environment, or process to change to be optimal or to find an optimal operating condition.
[name::Partition] [SpocWebEntityId::22240] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Segmentation]]] Divide an object into independent parts.
[name::periodic-action] [SpocWebEntityId::22281] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Periodic_action]]] Instead of continuous action, use periodic or pulsating actions.
[name::phase-transition] [SpocWebEntityId::22320] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Phase_transition]]] Use phenomena occurring during phase transitions (e.g. volume changes, loss or absorption of heat, etc.).
[name::piezo-electric] [SpocWebEntityId::22279] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Mechanical_vibration]]] Use piezoelectric vibrators instead of mechanical ones.

[name::porous] [SpocWebEntityId::22307] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Use_of_porous_material]]] Make an object porous or add porous Elements (inserts, coatings, etc.). This reduces Material Consumption while keeping Stability Properties.
[name::prepare-emergency] [SpocWebEntityId::22260] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Cushion_in_advance]]] Prepare emergency means beforehand to compensate for the relatively low reliability of an object.
[name::pure-oxygen] [SpocWebEntityId::22324] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Use_strong_oxidisers]]] Replace enriched air with pure oxygen.

[name::removed-obsolete] [SpocWebEntityId::22314] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Rejecting_and_regenerating_parts]]] Make Portions of an Object that have fulfilled their Functions go away (discard by dissolving, evaporating, etc.) or modify these directly during operation.

[name::replace-by-multiple] [SpocWebEntityId::22299] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-An_inexpensive_short-life_object_instead_of_an_expensive_durable_one]]] Replace an inexpensive object with a multiple of inexpensive objects, comprising certain qualities (such as service life, for instance).
[name::resonate] [SpocWebEntityId::22278] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Mechanical_vibration]]] Use an object's resonant frequency.
[name::restore-consumable] [SpocWebEntityId::22315] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Rejecting_and_regenerating_parts]]] Conversely, restore consumable parts of an object directly in operation.
[name::same-material] [SpocWebEntityId::22313] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Homogeneity]]] Make Objects interacting with a given object of the same material (or material with identical properties).
[name::Separate] [SpocWebEntityId::22243] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Extraction]]] Separate an interfering part or property from an object, or single out the only.
[name::thermal-expansion] [SpocWebEntityId::22321] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Thermal_expansion]]] Use thermal expansion (or contraction) of materials.
[name::tilt] [SpocWebEntityId::22274] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Moving_to_a_new_dimension]]] Tilt or re-orient the object, lay it on its side.
[name::upside-down] [SpocWebEntityId::22264] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Inversion]]] Turn the object (or process) 'upside down'.
[name::use-balls] [SpocWebEntityId::22266] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Spheroidality]]] Use rollers, balls, spirals, domes.
[name::use-copies] [SpocWebEntityId::22296] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Copying]]] Instead of an unavailable, expensive, fragile object, use simpler and inexpensive copies.
[name::use-EM-Field] [SpocWebEntityId::22301] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Replacement_of_a_mechanical_system]]] Use electric, magnetic and electromagnetic fields to interact with the object.
[name::use-field] [SpocWebEntityId::22303] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Replacement_of_a_mechanical_system]]] Use fields in conjunction with field-activated (e.g. ferromagnetic) particles.
[name::use-films] [SpocWebEntityId::22305] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Flexible_film_or_thin_membranes]]] Use flexible shells and thin films instead of three dimensional structures.

[name::use-fluid] [SpocWebEntityId::22304] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Use_a_pneumatic_or_hydralic_construction]]] Use gas and liquid parts of an object instead of solid parts (e.g. inflatable, filled with liquids, air cushion, hydrostatic, hydro-reactive).
[name::use-IR-UV-copies] [SpocWebEntityId::22298] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Copying]]] If visible optical copies are already used, move to infrared or ultraviolet copies.
[name::use-optical-copies] [SpocWebEntityId::22297] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Copying]]] Replace an object, or process with optical copies.
[name::use-pauses] [SpocWebEntityId::22283] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Periodic_action]]] Use pauses between impulses to perform a different action.
[name::use-rotation] [SpocWebEntityId::22267] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Spheroidality]]] Go from linear to rotary motion, use centrifugal forces.
[name::use-waste] [SpocWebEntityId::22295] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Self-service]]] Use waste resources, energy, or substances.
[name::Vacuum] [SpocWebEntityId::22330] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Inert_environment]]] Perform the Operation in Vacuum.
[name::vary-feedback] [SpocWebEntityId::22291] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Feedback]]] If feedback is already used, change its magnitude or influence.
[name::vary-oscillations] [SpocWebEntityId::22282] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Periodic_action]]] If an action is already periodic, change the periodic magnitude or frequency.
[name::vibrate] [SpocWebEntityId::22276] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Mechanical_vibration]]] Cause an object to oscillate or vibrate.

[name::weight-environment] [SpocWebEntityId::22255] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Counterweight]]] To compensate for the weight of an object, make it interact with the environment (e.g. use aerodynamic, hydrodynamic, buoyancy and other forces).
[name::weigt-lift] [SpocWebEntityId::22254] [TrizPrinciple::[[Triz-Counterweight]]] To compensate for the weight of an object, merge it with other objects that provide lift.
